name: Xave
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en: Xave Finance  (pronounced “Save Finance”) allows financial services companies (“fintechs”) to leverage DeFi for real time remittance transfers and high yield consumer savings. Xave does this in a capital efficient way by building an FX accurate AMM and stablecoin lending market that shares liquidity with the Balancer V2 Vault.
